name: An Old Well in the Forest

args: The deisigh rune sits in the pail, glimmering with magic.
The deisigh rune sits in the pail.

features.look: It's a brick well. It stands six-ish feet high.

args: The rope hangs down into the well.
The rope is retracted and it's attached to a pail sitting on the edge of the well.
You can't see it. It's all the way down at the bottom of the well.
The pail's sitting on the edge of the well and is attached to the well via a rope.

features.take: You shouldn't take the pail. How would anyone else draw water?

args: You can't reach it. It's all the way down at the bottom of the well.
You grab the pail and drop it down into the well. It falls all the way to the bottom and you can hear a splash from down in the darkness.

DEISIGH_RUNE: You put the deisigh rune into the pail.

features.look: The water in the pail is crystal clear.
features.take: If you had a container that you could hold the water in, you could use it on the water.

BOTTLE: You uncork the glass bottle and submerge it in the pail of water until it's full. Then you stopper the bottle and take it with you.

features.look: It's built into the side of the well's structure. When the pail's down in the well, the crank draws it back up to the surface.

args: You turn the crank on the side of the well over and over. Eventually the pail returns to the surface. You grab it and set it on the edge of the well.
There's no need. The pail's already on the edge of the well. You'd have to drop the pail first.

features.look: It's a dirt path, mostly overtaken by encroaching weeds. It hasn't seen traffic in a long time.
It's a well-worn dirt trail. It must see frequent traffic since there's hardly any weeds or grass growing.

args: You can't see it. It's in the pail at the bottom of the well.
The rune is sitting in the pail.
It's out of reach. It's in the pail at the bottom of the well.
You take the rune from the pail. The glimmering surrounding the rune grows in intensity and you watch as the rune dissolves into nothingness before your very eyes.
Suddenly, something pops into your head. A vague memory, half formed. You can now "incant deisigh", the Charm of Repairing!
You take the deisigh rune from the pail.

features.roomDesc: There is a small cairn, only about a foot high, standing next to the old well.
features.look: The pile of stones stands only about a foot tall. It's covered in runic markings.
